participant_1.background:
I try my best to keep in touch with my family, even though we live in different parts of the country.
i have 2 cats.
I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.
I exercise daily to keep my health in check and to have enough energy to keep up with my pets.
I would love to have lunch with my welding instructor, Mr

participant_2.background:
I love listening to rap music with my dog.
skateboarding is a hobby of mine.
I'm a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes.
I live in a small home and love my collection of comic books.
i want to be alone sometimes.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love listening to rap music with my dog, skateboarding, and organizing things.
That's cool! I love spending time with my family, exercising, and working on my welding projects.
I wish I had more family around. I have a small home, but I do have a huge collection of comic books.
I'm an only child, so I know what you mean. I do have a daughter, though, and I love spending time with her.
That's really nice. I'm not sure if I want kids or not. I'm pretty happy with my dog, honestly.
I can understand that. Kids are a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun.
Yeah, I know. I'll cross that bridge when I come to it.
Sounds good. So, what do you do for work?
I'm a personal organizer. I help people declutter their homes and lives.
That sounds really interesting! I'm not very good at organizing things, so I could probably use your help.
I'd be happy to help! Just let me know if you're ever interested.
